helper.title: Newbie Onboarding Buddy
helper.description: Pair up with new members to walk them through their first contribution step by step.

helper.title: Welcome Message Writer
helper.description: Create warm, clear welcome posts for newcomers in the community channels.

helper.title: Contribution Path Explainer
helper.description: Help new members understand the four paths (Builder, Educator, Artist, Helper) with examples.

helper.title: FAQ Maintainer
helper.description: Keep an up-to-date FAQ page so newcomers can find answers quickly.

helper.title: Weekly Community Recap
helper.description: Summarize weekly events, projects, and contributions in a short digest post.

helper.title: Event Moderator
helper.description: Support events by moderating chats, Q&A, and keeping the flow smooth.

helper.title: Feedback Partner
helper.description: Offer constructive feedback to others on their contributions to encourage quality.

helper.title: Quick Start Checklist
helper.description: Design a short checklist for newcomers to complete their first week in Sentient.

helper.title: Discussion Organizer
helper.description: Help keep chat threads clear by summarizing and guiding conversations.

helper.title: Shoutout Maker
helper.description: Post shoutouts to highlight and celebrate other members' contributions.

helper.title: Help Channel Responder
helper.description: Be active in the help channel, answering newcomers' questions daily.

helper.title: Event Note Taker
helper.description: Take detailed notes during community calls and share them afterward.

helper.title: Poll Creator
helper.description: Run polls to gather opinions on tools, events, or community initiatives.

helper.title: Guided Tour Host
helper.description: Organize a short live session where you walk new members through Sentient platforms.

helper.title: Onboarding Video Assistant
helper.description: Help record or edit video tutorials for onboarding new members.

helper.title: Resource Librarian
helper.description: Maintain a shared folder or Notion page of useful resources for new contributors.

helper.title: Community Calendar Manager
helper.description: Keep track of upcoming events and share weekly reminders.

helper.title: Icebreaker Organizer
helper.description: Post fun icebreaker questions or small activities for newcomers to engage.

helper.title: Sentient Buddy System
helper.description: Pair newcomers with experienced members and help coordinate the system.

helper.title: Spotlight Stories
helper.description: Interview members about their contributions and publish their stories.

helper.title: Event Reminder Poster
helper.description: Post reminders before events so members don't miss them.

helper.title: Checklist Designer
helper.description: Design onboarding checklists or progress trackers for new helpers.

helper.title: Feedback Collector
helper.description: Collect anonymous feedback about community events and share insights.

helper.title: Guide Translator
helper.description: Translate onboarding or guide materials into other languages for global members.

helper.title: Community Icebreaker Host
helper.description: Run small live sessions where members introduce themselves and connect.

helper.title: New Member Follow-up
helper.description: Check in with new members after their first week to ensure they are engaged.

helper.title: Knowledge Connector
helper.description: Match members with similar interests or projects and introduce them.

helper.title: Event Setup Helper
helper.description: Assist organizers with preparing Zoom/Discord settings and roles before calls.

helper.title: Community Health Monitor
helper.description: Keep track of participation and help identify members who may need encouragement.

helper.title: Workshop Assistant
helper.description: Support educators by handling logistics during workshops.

helper.title: Guide Summarizer
helper.description: Take long guides and create short summaries for quick reading.

helper.title: Newbie Questions Collector
helper.description: Collect common beginner questions and turn them into a community resource.

helper.title: Sentient Map Maker
helper.description: Create a simple visual map showing where to find everything in the community.

helper.title: Encouragement Poster
helper.description: Post motivational messages or reminders to keep builders and educators active.

helper.title: Community Support Hotline
helper.description: Be available at set times for newcomers to DM or ask for live help.

helper.title: Newcomer Interviewer
helper.description: Interview new members about why they joined and share their answers as posts.

helper.title: Onboarding Checklist Designer
helper.description: Create visual onboarding checklists for Sentient newcomers.

helper.title: Learning Path Helper
helper.description: Suggest resources to newcomers based on their chosen role.

helper.title: Community Icebreaker Meme
helper.description: Create light memes to make new members feel welcome.

helper.description: Share a short report of what helpers did that week to support the community.

helper.title: Contribution Recognition Post
helper.description: Make posts tagging members who did great work that week.

helper.title: Mentorship Assistant
helper.description: Help coordinate mentors with mentees in the community.
